text: Adil Ray (; born 26 April 1974) is a British actor, comedian and a radio and television presenter. ==Works== Ray stars in the BBC One comedy Citizen Khan, which he created and helps write as well working on various BBC radio stations. He also is a standby presenter of the ITV breakfast show Good Morning Britain and he acted as Sadiq Nawaz in the Channel 4 drama series Ackley Bridge. In 2021, he presented the revival of the ITV afternoon game show Lingo. == References == Category:British television presenters Category:British game show hosts Category:British comedians Category:1974 births Category:Living people
title: Adil Ray
